   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Test of the pool_size option in connecting nodes with multiple
   23: %% connections.
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(diameter_pool_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   29: -export([run/0,
   30:          run/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% common_test wrapping
   33: -export([suite/0,
   34:          all/0,
   35:          tcp/1,
   36:          sctp/1,
   37:          any/1]).
   38: 
   39: %% ===========================================================================
   40: 
   41: -define(util, diameter_util).
   42: 
   43: %% Config for diameter:start_service/2.
   44: -define(SERVICE(Host),
   45:         [{'Origin-Host', Host ++ ".ericsson.com"},
   46:          {'Origin-Realm', "ericsson.com"},
   47:          {'Host-IP-Address', [{127,0,0,1}]},
   48:          {'Vendor-Id', 12345},
   49:          {'Product-Name', "OTP/diameter"},
   50:          {'Auth-Application-Id', [0]},  %% common
   51:          {'Acct-Application-Id', [3]},  %% accounting
   52:          {restrict_connections, false},
   53:          {spawn_opt, {diameter_dist, route_session, []}},
   54:          {application, [{alias, common},
   55:                         {dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
   56:                         {module, diameter_callback}]},
   57:          {application, [{alias, accounting},
   58:                         {dictionary, diameter_gen_acct_rfc6733},
   59:                         {module, diameter_callback}]}]).
   60: 
   61: %% ===========================================================================
   62: 
   63: suite() ->
   64:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 45}}].
   65: 
   66: all() ->
   67:     [tcp, sctp, any].
   68: 
   69: tcp(_Config) ->
   70:     run([tcp]).
   71: 
   72: sctp(_Config) ->
   73:     case ?util:have_sctp() of
   74:         true  -> run([sctp]);
   75:         false -> {skip, no_sctp}
   76:     end.
   77: 
   78: any(_Config) ->
   79:     run([any]).
   80: 
   81: %% ===========================================================================
   82: 
   83: %% run/0
   84: 
   85: run() ->
   86:     run(all()).
   87: 
   88: %% run/1
   89: 
   90: run(tcp = T) ->
   91:     connect(T, T);
   92: 
   93: run(sctp = T) ->
   94:     connect(T, T);
   95: 
   96: run(any = T) ->
   97:     connect(T, tcp);
   98: 
   99: run(List) ->
  100:     ok = diameter:start(),
  101:     try
  102:         ?util:run([[{[fun run/1, T], 30000}  || T <- List]])
  103:     after
  104:         ok = diameter:stop()
  105:     end.
  106: 
  107: %% connect/2
  108: 
  109: %% Establish multiple connections between a client and server.
  110: connect(ClientProt, ServerProt) ->
  111:     [] = [{S,T} || S <- ["server", "client"],
  112:                    T <- [diameter:start_service(S, ?SERVICE(S))],
  113:                    T /= ok],
  114:     %% Listen with a single transport with pool_size = 4. Ensure the
  115:     %% expected number of transport processes are started.
  116:     LRef = ?util:listen("server", ServerProt, [{pool_size, 4}]),
  117:     {4,0} = count("server", LRef, accept), %% 4 transports, no connections
  118:     %% Establish 5 connections.
  119:     N = pool_size(5),  %% connections to establish
  120:     Ref = ?util:connect("client", ClientProt, LRef, [{pool_size, N}]),
  121:     {N,N} = count("client", Ref, pool),    %% N connections
  122:     %% Ensure the server has started replacement transports within a
  123:     %% reasonable time. Sleepsince there's no guarantee the
  124:     %% replacements have been started before the client has received
  125:     %% 'up' events. (Although it's likely.)
  126:     timer:sleep(1000),
  127:     N4 = N + 4,
  128:     {N4,N} = count("server", LRef, accept), %% N connections + 4 accepting
  129:     %% Ensure there are still the expected number of accepting transports
  130:     %% after stopping the client service.
  131:     ok = diameter:stop_service("client"),
  132:     timer:sleep(1000),
  133:     {4,0} = count("server", LRef, accept), %% 4 transports, no connections
  134:     %% Done.
  135:     ok = diameter:remove_transport("client", true),
  136:     ok = diameter:remove_transport("server", true),
  137:     ok = diameter:stop_service("server").
  138: 
  139: count(Name, Ref, Key) ->
  140:     [{transport, [[{ref, Ref} | T]]},
  141:      {connections, Cs}]
  142:         = diameter:service_info(Name, [transport, connections]),
  143:     {Key, Ps} = lists:keyfind(Key, 1, T),
  144:     {length(Ps), length(Cs)}.  %% number of processes, connections
  145: 
  146: %% Simultaneous connections are often refused on Darwin: don't try to
  147: %% establish more than one.
  148: pool_size(N) ->
  149:     case os:type() of
  150:         {_, 'darwin'} -> 1;
  151:         _             -> rand:uniform(N)
  152:     end.
